item.title: Have a story to tell - Nurdin
item.description: On my way back from Ljubljana to Genova, I had a 1 hour halt in Milano Lampugnano, a bus stop designated for travellers that use the regional/cross-border buses. I was surprisingly not tired despite an 8 hour bus ride, thanks to the cross-logged posture and Greta Van Fleet while slowly absorbing every perfectly played solo. By the time it was 15 minutes into my wait, it began getting cold and bought a ‘panino’ & coffee to warm my body.
